fields.description: Improve performance by vectorizing Struct IN() clauses.  Related to HIVE-11428.

comments.body: Only supports integers and strings at the moment.  Only tested with 2 simple tests.

Patch 2 adds more tests and verifies integers, strings, and doubles (probably never will be used) will vectorize in Vectorized Struct IN().  No decimal, timestamp, date for now.

Note the semantic type checking for struct constants is extremely inflexible.  Types must be exact, so you'll see capital L being added in the struct expressions to make integers type bigint, or the query will not parse...
